job.title: Software Engineer, Web
job.description: Job SummarybrbrWe are looking for a talented frontend engineer to join a team that creates largescale highlyperformant web applications This team transforms large complex datasets into fast and responsive user interfaces used by millions of peoplebrbrAs a Software Engineer for Web Full Stack you will help us push the boundaries of what is possible on the client Youll work with a team of other developers alongside systems engineers services engineers and project managers You are highly proficient in JavaScript HTML and CSS and appreciate the details that make a user experience exceptional You demonstrate enthusiasm for new technologies languages frameworks and platformsbrbrWe believe we offer unique opportunities for any technologist includingbrbrulliThe ability to work on a bleeding edge technology stackliliInfluencing the innovation of products used globally by millionsliliAn open teamdriven environment that fosters constructive feedback and collective problemsolvingbrbrliulResponsibilitiesbrbrulliImplement web interfaces and applications using JavaScript ES6 HTML and CSSliliWork on a modern stack including React NodeJS Amazon Web ServicesliliEnforce code quality through test driven developmentliliDistill product requirements into design and technical specificationsliliCollaborate closely with other engineering product and marketing teams to define product requirementsbrbrliulstrongBasic Qualificationsbrbrstrongulli23 years of experience building web applicationsliliExperience in a NodeJS application development environmentliliExperience working within a modern JavaScript workflow through technologies such as GitHub CSS Preprocessors Styled Components Single Page Application frameworks and Module Bundlers Webpack etcliliProven ability to integrate with service APIs andor SDKsliliExperience with rootcause analysis and troubleshooting infrastructure issuesbrbrliulPreferred QualificationsbrbrulliExperience with streaming video ecommerce large data applications and analytics suitesliliHands on experience with ReactRedux in a production applicationbrbrliulRequired
